attributes.action: request that all ex service personnel who served  for this country between 1939-1945 are exempt from paying council tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as the verterns of the second world war are getting fewer by the years we request that the prime minister introduces an act of parliment to excempt all veterans from paying local council tax as a thank you they reightly deserve. if it wasnt for these people who both voluntered and conscripted we would not beliving in a democratic country today.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
